content: I'm interested in playing around with how diagnostics are emitted, but it takes several 10 minutes to compile since a bunch of crates depend on rustc_errors. Do you have any tips for how to make small changes and see the output quickly? Or is that just not possible? Thanks!
Have tried using the " --keep-stage 1" flag as described in the rustc dev guide ? My compile times with this are usually under 2 mins
